The surprise is all messed up now.$3"/pause 300/move farmer -2 0 0/move FC.Barron 0 1 0/move FC.Barron -2 0 0/faceDirection FC.Phoebe 2/faceDirection FC.Amanda 2/pause 300/speak FC.Barron "Who's this, what's going on?$3"/pause 300/faceDirection FC.Phoebe 3/faceDirection FC.Phoebe 2/pause 250/speak FC.Phoebe "This is Amanda, you're grandmother.$2#$b#We wanted to surprise you, but things didn't go according to plan.$5"/pause 1000/quickQuestion #She looks pretty surprised to me.#Sorry about that.(break)speak FC.Barron "Honestly, I am pretty surprised.#1"\friendship FC.Amanda 3(break)speak FC.Amanda "Oh no, I'm sure it's okay.#$b#No reason to apologize.$1"\friendship FC.Amanda 3/pause 200/speak FC.Barron "Wow, you came all this way. Just to meet me?$3"/pause 200/textAbovehead FC.Amanda "My goodness."/playMusic 50s/move farmer -2 0 1/move FC.Amanda 0 1 1/faceDirection FC.Barron 3/move FC.Amanda 1 0 1/positionOffset FC.Amanda 0 20/showFrame FC.Amanda 30/pause 300/speak FC.Amanda "Don't take this the wrong way dear, but you look so much like your great grandfather.$1#$b#You're such a beautiful woman.#5"/pause 400/emote FC.Barron 40/pause 300/speak FC.Barron "You really think so?$4"/pause 350/showFrame FC.Amanda 4/textAbovehead FC.Amanda "I do."/pause 400/shake FC.Barron 1500/pause 300/textAbovehead FC.Phoebe "Oh honey."/positionOffset FC.Amanda -20 0/pause 200/speak FC.Phoebe "Why are you crying?$2"/pause 200/emote FC.Amanda 28/pause 200/speak FC.Amanda "Are you okay?$2"/move farmer 1 0 1/quickQuestion #I think she's just happy to finally meet you.#Maybe she's overwhelmed?(break)speak FC.Barron "Yeah...That's it exactly, I never thought I would meet any of my relatives.$7#$b#This is a dream come true.$7"\friendship FC.Amanda 3(break)speak FC.Amanda "Oh no, Barron I'm so sorry.$2#$b#Are you okay dear?$5"\friendship FC.Barron -3/pause 300/speak FC.Barron "Don't worry, I'm okay really.$7#$b#I've just never been so happy before.$7"/pause 360/speak FC.Phoebe "Well, this is supposed to be a party, lets celebrate!$1"/pause 300/textAbovehead FC.Barron "Yeah!"/pause 200/speak FC.Barron "I'd really like that.$1"/pause 200/viewport move 1 -1 6000000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
